issue.title: [Release] Add script to test release verification script against master branch
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4292](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4292). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This should enable us to find problems with the verification script well before releases happen.
